summary: Retexture mod for Durnehviir, from the Dawnguard DLC. Not high-resolution work, just repainting only.
descriptionHtml:
[center][i][font=Trebuchet MS][size=6]The Decayed Dragon - Durnehviir Retex[/size]
[size=2]
[img]https://c2.staticflickr.com/6/5463/30402177654_c9076e4075_b.jpg[/img][/size]
[/font][/i][/center]
[font=Georgia][size=3][i]It's a retexture of the undead dragon of Soul Cairn, Durnehviir. I just cleaned up the diffuse maps a tad, added some contrast to it, and sharpened some minor details. Normal maps were cleaned up, smoothed out and heightened to increase bump detail only. No real high-resolution work was done.

Diffuse maps are compressed.
Normal maps are uncompressed.

The textures are twice the Bethesda High Resolution Texture Pack resolution sizes. 

[b][u]Requirements:[/u][/b]
[/i][/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=3][i]- Skyrim
- [i]Dawnguard DLC[/i]

[/i][/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=3][i][b][u]Installation:[/u][/b]
[/i][/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=3][i]Just copy and paste into your Steam directory for your Skyrim installation.

[font=Georgia][size=3][i][b][u]Permissions:[/u][/b]
[/i][/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=3][i]Credits to Bethesda Softworks for their game.[/i][/size][/font][/i][/size][/font]

[i][i][size=3][font=Georgia][i][b]My Mods:
[/b][/i]- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86093/?]Dragons Resized[/url]
[size=3][i][size=3][i][size=3][i][size=3][i]- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83328/?]Tree Faeries - Spriggan Retextures[/url][/i][/size][/i][/size]
[/i][/size][/i][/size][/font][/size][/i][/i][i][size=3][i][i][size=3][i]- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73321/?]Seeker and Lurker - Creature Retex[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73385/?]Storm Atronach - Creature Retex[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69903/?]Bones and Scales - Armour Retex[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74871/?]Reflective Vanilla Armours[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80454/?]The Decayed Dragon - Durnehviir Retex[/url][/i][/size][/i][/i][/size][/i]

[size=3]//////////////////

Shameless promotion for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/571605/?]CaBaL120[/url] and his absolutely gorgeous work. Go check out his mods!
